name: pxl
desc:
Fixed-size buffer of Pixels, with customizable PixelFormats,
BlendModes, and more.

name: Abgr8888
desc: 32-bit ABGR pixel format with four 8-bit channels.

name: bytesPerPixel
desc: Number of bytes required to store a single pixel in memory.

name: clamp
desc: Clamps a pixel to the valid range of values for the pixel format.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy of the pixel.

name: copyWithNormalized
desc: Returns a copy of the pixel with normalized values.

name: distance
desc: Returns the distance between two pixels in the pixel format.

name: fromAbgr8888
desc: Converts a pixel in the abgr8888 pixel format to this pixel format.

name: getAlpha
desc: Returns the alpha channel value of the pixel.

name: getBlue
desc: Returns the blue channel value of the pixel.

name: getGreen
desc: Returns the green channel value of the pixel.

name: getRed
desc: Returns the red channel value of the pixel.

name: max
desc: The maximum value for the pixel format.

name: maxAlpha
desc: The maximum value for the alpha channel.

name: maxBlue
desc: The maximum value for the blue channel.

name: maxGreen
desc: The maximum value for the green channel.

name: maxRed
desc: The maximum value for the red channel.

name: minAlpha
desc: The minimum value for the alpha channel.

name: minBlue
desc: The minimum value for the blue channel.

name: minGreen
desc: The minimum value for the green channel.

name: minRed
desc: The minimum value for the red channel.

desc: Human-readable name or description of the pixel format.

desc: Converts a pixel in this pixel format to the abgr8888 pixel format.

name: BlendMode
desc: Algorithms to use when painting on the canvas.

name: clear
desc: Destination pixels covered by the source are cleared to 0.

name: dst
desc: Source pixels are replaced by the destination pixels.

name: dstAtop
desc: The destination that overlaps the source is blended with the source.

name: dstIn
desc: The destination that overlaps the source replaces the source.

name: dstOut
desc: The destination that does not overlap the source replaces the source.

name: dstOver
desc: The destination color is placed over the source color.

name: getBlend
desc: Returns a function that blends two pixels together.

name: plus
desc: The source and destination regions are added together.

name: src
desc: Destination pixels are replaced by the source pixels.

name: srcAtop
desc: The source that overlaps the destination is blended with the destination.

name: srcIn
desc: The source that overlaps the destination replaces the destination.

name: srcOut
desc: The source that does not overlap the destination replaces the destination.

name: srcOver
desc: The source color is placed over the destination color.

name: xor
desc: The non-overlapping regions of the source and destination are combined.

name: Buffer
desc: A 2-dimensional view of pixel data T in memory.

name: bounds
desc: Returns the buffer as a bounding rectangle.

name: contains
desc: Returns whether the given position is within the bounds of the buffer.

name: data
desc: Pixel data in the buffer.

name: format
desc: Format of the pixel data in the buffer.

name: get
desc: Returns the pixel at the given position.

name: getRange
desc: Returns a lazy iterable of pixels in the buffer from start to end.

name: getRangeUnsafe
desc: Returns a lazy iterable of pixels in the buffer from start to end.

name: getRect
desc: Returns a lazy iterable of pixels in the rectangle defined by rect.

name: getRectUnsafe
desc: Returns a lazy iterable of pixels in the rectangle defined by rect.

name: getUnsafe
desc: Returns the pixel at the given position without bounds checking.

name: height
desc: Height of the buffer in pixels.

name: isEmpty
desc: Returns whether the buffer is empty.

name: isNotEmpty
desc: Returns whether the buffer is not empty.

name: length
desc: Length of the buffer in pixels.

name: map
desc: Returns a lazy buffer buffer that converts pixels with the given function.

name: mapConvert
desc: Returns a lazy buffer that converts pixels to the given format.

name: mapIndexed
desc: Returns a lazy buffer that converts pixels with the given function.

name: mapRect
desc: Returns a lazy buffer that clips the buffer to the given bounds.

name: width
desc: Width of the buffer in pixels.

name: FloatPixels
desc: A 2-dimensional buffer of multi-channel floating point pixel data in memory.

name: FloatPixels
desc: Creates a new buffer of multi-channel floating point pixel data.

name: data
desc: Raw bytes of pixel data.

name: FloatPixels.from
desc:
Creates a copy of the given buffer with the same pixel data and
dimensions.

name: IndexedFormat
desc: A pixel format that uses a predefined palette to index colors.

name: operator []
desc: Returns the color in the palette at the given index.

name: IndexedFormat.bits8
desc: Creates an 8-bit indexed pixel format with the given palette.

name: IndexedFormat.bits16
desc: Creates an 16-bit indexed pixel format with the given palette.

name: IndexedFormat.bits32
desc: Creates an 32-bit indexed pixel format with the given palette.

name: IntPixels

name: IntPixels
desc: Creates a new buffer of integer-based pixel data.

desc: Raw bytes of pixel data.

desc:
Creates a copy of the given buffer with the same pixel data and
dimensions.

name: PixelFormat
desc: Describes the organization and characteristics of pixel data P in memory.

name: bytesPerPixel
desc: Number of bytes required to store a single pixel in memory.

name: clamp
desc: Clamps a pixel to the valid range of values for the pixel format.

name: convert
desc: Converts a pixel from one another format to this format.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy of the pixel.

name: copyWithNormalized
desc: Returns a copy of the pixel with normalized values.

name: distance
desc: Returns the distance between two pixels in the pixel format.

name: fromAbgr8888
desc: Converts a pixel in the abgr8888 pixel format to this pixel format.

name: fromFloatRgba
desc: Converts a pixel in the floatRgba pixel format to this pixel format.

name: max
desc: The maximum value for the pixel format.

name: name

name: toAbgr8888
desc: Converts a pixel in this pixel format to the abgr8888 pixel format.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: zero
desc: The zero, or minimum, value for the pixel format.

name: Pixels
desc: A 2-dimensional buffer of pixel data in memory.

name: blit
desc:
Blits, or copies with blending, the pixel data from a source buffer to
this buffer.

name: blitUnsafe
desc:
Blits, or copies with blending, the pixel data from a source buffer to
this buffer.

name: clear
desc: Clears the buffer to the PixelFormat.zero value.

name: clearUnsafe
desc: Clears the buffer to the PixelFormat.zero value.

name: copyFrom
desc: Copies the pixel data from a source buffer to this buffer.

name: copyFromUnsafe
desc: Copies the pixel data from a source buffer to this buffer.

name: data
desc: Raw bytes of pixel data.

name: fill
desc: Fill the buffer with the given pixel.

name: fillUnsafe
desc: Fill the buffer with the given pixel.

name: fillWith
desc: Fill the buffer with the given pixels.

name: fillWithUnsafe
desc: Fill the buffer with the given pixels.

name: format
desc: Format of the pixel data in the buffer.

name: getRangeUnsafe
desc: Returns a lazy iterable of pixels in the buffer from start to end.

name: getRectUnsafe
desc: Returns a lazy iterable of pixels in the rectangle defined by rect.

name: getUnsafe
desc: Returns the pixel at the given position without bounds checking.

name: height
desc: Height of the buffer in pixels.

name: set
desc: Sets the pixel at the given position.

name: setUnsafe
desc: Sets the pixel at the given position without bounds checking.

name: width
desc: Width of the buffer in pixels.

name: PorterDuff
desc: A BlendMode that uses Porter-Duff coefficients to blend colors.

name: PorterDuff
desc: Creates a blend mode with Porter-Duff coefficients.

name: dst
desc: Returns the destination alpha channel (dstAlpha).

name: getBlend
desc: Returns a function that blends two pixels together.

name: one
desc: Always returns one (1.0).

name: oneMinusDst
desc: Returns one minus the destination alpha channel (1 - dstAlpha).

name: oneMinusSrc
desc: Returns one minus the source alpha channel (1 - srcAlpha).

name: src
desc: Returns the source alpha channel (srcAlpha).

name: zero
desc: Always returns zero (0.0).

name: Pos
desc: An immutable 2D fixed-point vector.

name: Rect
desc: An immutable 2D fixed-point rectangle.

name: Rgb

name: black
desc: Black color with full transparency.

desc: Blue color with full transparency.
